title: New Japanese Voices

embed.description: サモナーの皆様、まもなく始まる「リーグ・オブ・レジェンド」モニタリングテストに先駆け、日本版チャンピオンの声を一部先行で公開！　また、声を担当して頂いた声優さん4名のインタビューも収録。

body:
I'm going to keep this short and sweet:
Does anyone else want to have the Japanese voices available as an option to switch between? 
Vote your response in the poll.

replies.body: Lol the death sound for Ahri
lol, have you heard the chinese version of it XD so much better

Anime logic: Girls have orgasms when they die
CONFIRMED

not just girls
Have you heard Taric's?

It'd be just like anime, then people would be called weebs for using it, though i would like the option to change a few champs VO, Teemo is so much less annoying.

And between you and me, that ziggs VO sounds like Light Yagami when he is doing the "evil" speak. And tf like "Atomic Samurai" (totally yasuo, just look at that guys appearance and moves)
IKR Teemo is Pikachu's voice actress and Ziggs is Kaneki from Tokyo Ghoul also, Yasuo is Gintoki from Gintama.
Annie is Happy from Fairy Tail
Braum is Major armstrong from FMA (which couldnt be a better fit)
Who's your favourite Japanese voice in league? Mine is probably Wukong... it's Goku!!!
